title: Old fashioned rabbit stew
description: Rabbit only needs a few ingredients to be transformed into a delicious one-pot meal.
ingredients: 2 tsp dried thyme, or 2 tbsp chopped fresh thyme leaves
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 large farmed rabbit or 2 young wild rabbits, jointed into 8 pieces
6 rashers rindless smoked streaky bacon, cut into 2cm/¾in squares
